articles.title: Click’s Journey AI Announces Integration Partnership with 8amMyCase to Streamline Law Firm Lead Intake & Client Follow Up
articles.mainIdea: Click’s Journey AI Announces Integration Partnership with 8amMyCase to Streamline Law Firm Lead Intake & Client Follow Up
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Click’s Journey AI Announces Integration Partnership with 8amMyCase to Streamline Law Firm Lead Intake & Client Follow Up. Click’s Journey AI Announces Integration Partnership with 8amMyCase to Streamline Law Firm AutomationSanta Barbara, CA , Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Click’s Journey AI, a leading marketing automation and analytics platform for law firms, is thrilled to announce its official integration partnership with 8amMyCase, a premier legal practice management software.
